A data structure is a particular way of organizing data in a computer so that it can be used efficiently. Examples include arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues.
An operating system is system software that manages computer hardware and software resources, and provides common services for computer programs.
Computer networks allow devices to exchange data using wired or wireless technology. Protocols like TCP/IP govern how this data is transmitted.
An algorithm is a finite set of instructions that, when followed, accomplish a particular task. It is a fundamental concept in computer science.
Software engineering is the application of engineering principles to the design, development, testing, and maintenance of software systems.
Cybersecurity involves techniques and processes that protect systems, networks, and programs from digital attacks.
In machine learning, overfitting occurs when a model learns the training data too well, including noise, and performs poorly on unseen data.
L'intelligence artificielle permet aux machines de simuler l'intelligence humaine, y compris l'apprentissage et la résolution de problèmes.
La programación orientada a objetos permite organizar el código en clases y objetos, lo que facilita la reutilización y el mantenimiento.
Katika mashine za kujifunza, modeli hujifunza kutoka kwa data ili kufanya maamuzi au utabiri bila kuandikwa kwa njia ya moja kwa moja.
React is widely used in frontend development due to its component-based architecture and virtual DOM performance.
GitHub is a platform for hosting and collaborating on code projects using Git version control.
DevOps encourages collaboration between developers and IT operations, often using CI/CD pipelines for automation.
Un algoritmo de búsqueda binaria divide un conjunto de datos ordenado por la mitad para encontrar un valor objetivo eficientemente.
Python supports multiple programming paradigms, including procedural, object-oriented, and functional programming.
MongoDB is a NoSQL database that stores data in flexible, JSON-like documents.
In natural language processing, tokenization is the process of splitting text into individual words or subwords.
Cloud services like AWS and Azure provide scalable infrastructure for deploying applications globally.
In Akan: 'Nkɔmɔ anaa kasa yie a ɛkɔ so wɔ mfonini' kyerɛ 'communication systems' a ɛboa ma yɛde data to hɔ wɔ wireless ne cable.
The Turing Test, developed by Alan Turing, evaluates a machine's ability to exhibit intelligent behavior equivalent to a human.
